app-title: Application title, used in various places.
app-subtitle: Application subtitle, at the top of every page.
footer-version:
Application name and version statement.

Parameters:
* $1 - the application title.
* $2 - a link to the current version (constructed with the 'version' message below).
version:
Text for the version link.

Parameter:
* $1 - the current version number.
commit-label:
Tooltip for the version link.

Parameter:

* $1 - the current commit's short hash.
licensed-under:
License statement.
Parameter:
* $1 - a link with the text of the 'license-link' message.
license-link: Text for the license link, included in the 'licensed-under' message.
source-and-docs:
Source code and documentation statement.

Parameters:
* $1 - a link with the text of the 'source-link' message.
* $2 - link with the text of the 'docs-link' message.
source-link: Link text for the link to Github, included in the 'source-and-docs' message.
docs-link: Link text for the link to the tool's documentation Multilingual Wikisource, included in the 'source-and-docs' message
statistics:
Statistics statement.

Parameter:
* $1 - a link to the statistics page, with text from the 'statistics-link' message.
statistics-link: Link text for the link to the statistics page, used in the 'statistics' message.
issues:
Statement about bug reporting.

Parameter:
* $1 - a link to Phabricator, with '#wsexport' as the link text (untranslatable, because it's not translatable in Phabricator).
issue-button: Button text on a link to create a new bug report.
export-book: Header for the main export form.
lang-field-label: Form field label for the Wikisource language dropdown field.
lang-field-value:
Format for each option in the language dropdown field.

* $1 - The language name in the current interface language (can be translated on Wikidata).
* $2 - The subdomain for the language's Wikisource.
lang-field-help: Help text for the language field.
title-field-label: Form field label for the 'Title' field.
format-field-label: Form field label for the 'Format' field.
format-field-help: Help text for the 'Format' field. Not currently used for English, but other languages may use it.
invalid-format:
Error message displayed when an invalid format is given in the URL.

Parameters:
* $1 - the user-supplied format.
* $2 - a list of valid formats (which are not translatable).
font-field-label: Form field label for the 'Font' field.
no-font-option: Font dropdown option to indicate that no font should be used.
font-field-help:
Help text for the 'Font' field.

Parameter:
* $1 is the total number of fonts (an integer).
options-label: Form label for the set of 'Options' fields.
credits-field-label: Form field label for the 'do/don't include credits' option field.
credits-default-message: Text shown in place of credits when they are not included in a book.
images-field-label: Form field label for the 'do/don't include images' option field.
nocache-field-label: Form field label for the 'disable caching' option field.
export-button: Button text for the main export form.
cache-updated:
Message displayed after a user has requested a cache-refresh.

Parameter:
$1 - the language code that was refreshed.
